hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Amr narrated that:Allah's Messenger (S) said: "When he commits Hadath - meaning a man - and he is sitting in the end of his Salat before saying the Taslim, then his Salat is acceptable

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يُحْدِثُ فِي التَّشَهُّدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Commites Hadath After The Tashah-hud
